projects.title: Vinyl Player
projects.description: VinylPlayer-CssJS is a web-based application that emulates the experience of using a vinyl record player. Leveraging only CSS and JavaScript, this project offers a lightweight and visually appealing interface for 'playing' digital audio files. While not a fully functional audio player in the traditional sense, it's a unique demonstration of front-end capabilities, focusing on recreating the aesthetic and interactive elements of a classic vinyl player.

projects.title: Snake Game - Web
projects.description: A modern, browser-based take on the timeless snake game, built with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript. The project delivers a fully interactive experience: the player navigates the snake around the grid, eats the food items to grow longer, and must avoid colliding with its own tail or the boundaries.
